mobhealthindicators.name: Mob Health Indicators
config.mobhealthindicators.option.dynami:
Render the health bar at the mobâ€™s light level.
If disabled, it always renders at full brightness.
config.mobhealthindicators.option.render:
When looking at a mobs, its health bar renders through blocks and other entities.
The health bar's lighting and shadow may render wrong with some shaders.
config.mobhealthindicators.option.infini: Make the range for targeting a mobs infinite instead of the normal range for interacting with blocks and mobs.
config.mobhealthindicators.option.onlysh: Shows the health bar only for the mob you are looking at.
key.category.mobhealthindicators.name: Mob Health Indicators
